attributes.additional_details: Make Non Global Warming Gases available for cars
attributes.background: Pass Laws that will allow CNG and LNG be available at filling stations. For private cars

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. LNG are CNG are not non-polluting gasses, as they still contribute to climate emissions according to scientific research, see for example: 

https://www.reuters.com/article/us-climate-change-gas-idUSKBN247303

We could accept a petition calling for the UK Government to allow vehicles to be powered by CNG and LNG without requiring speciifc permission, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
